title: Planar Conquest v1.0.3d hotfix-Reloaded
description:
Planar Conquest (c) Wastelands Interactive

05/2016 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
      1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Indie, RPG
                                                   Simulation, Strategy

Become an all-powerful Sorcerer Lord and lead one of 8 different races to
the ultimate victory. Explore multiple planes of existence, raid dungeons,
and conquer cities. Expand your armies, cast mighty spells, and summon
godly creatures to do your bidding.

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game.
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!


Planar Conquest v1.3.0d Hotfix (c) Wastelands Interactive

Release Date: 30/06/2016        Protection: Steam

Cracked By..: BAT-TEAM          # of Files: few

Note:

Changelog.txt included in the pack.

Requires Planar.Conquest-RELOADED installed.

"this update includes previously released updates"

1. Unpack release.
2. Install the Update to where you installed the game
(allow run applyPatchFiles.exe after installing).
3. Enjoy :)
